00026 #ifndef KADC2CUDP_H
00027 #define KADC2CUDP_H
00028 
00029 enum KademliaV1OPcodes {
00030     KADEMLIA_BOOTSTRAP_REQ_DEPRECATED   = 0x00, // <PEER (sender) [25]>
00031     KADEMLIA_BOOTSTRAP_RES_DEPRECATED   = 0x08, // <CNT [2]> <PEER [25]>*(CNT)
00032 
00033     KADEMLIA_HELLO_REQ_DEPRECATED       = 0x10, // <PEER (sender) [25]>
00034     KADEMLIA_HELLO_RES_DEPRECATED       = 0x18, // <PEER (receiver) [25]>
00035 
00036     KADEMLIA_REQ_DEPRECATED         = 0x20, // <TYPE [1]> <HASH (target) [16]> <HASH (receiver) 16>
00037     KADEMLIA_RES_DEPRECATED         = 0x28, // <HASH (target) [16]> <CNT> <PEER [25]>*(CNT)
00038 
00039     KADEMLIA_SEARCH_REQ         = 0x30, // <HASH (key) [16]> <ext 0/1 [1]> <SEARCH_TREE>[ext]
00040     // UNUSED               = 0x31, // Old Opcode, don't use.
00041     KADEMLIA_SEARCH_NOTES_REQ       = 0x32, // <HASH (key) [16]>
00042     KADEMLIA_SEARCH_RES         = 0x38, // <HASH (key) [16]> <CNT1 [2]> (<HASH (answer) [16]> <CNT2 [2]> <META>*(CNT2))*(CNT1)
00043     // UNUSED               = 0x39, // Old Opcode, don't use.
00044     KADEMLIA_SEARCH_NOTES_RES       = 0x3A, // <HASH (key) [16]> <CNT1 [2]> (<HASH (answer) [16]> <CNT2 [2]> <META>*(CNT2))*(CNT1)
00045 
00046     KADEMLIA_PUBLISH_REQ            = 0x40, // <HASH (key) [16]> <CNT1 [2]> (<HASH (target) [16]> <CNT2 [2]> <META>*(CNT2))*(CNT1)
00047     // UNUSED               = 0x41, // Old Opcode, don't use.
00048     KADEMLIA_PUBLISH_NOTES_REQ_DEPRECATED   = 0x42, // <HASH (key) [16]> <HASH (target) [16]> <CNT2 [2]> <META>*(CNT2))*(CNT1)
00049     KADEMLIA_PUBLISH_RES            = 0x48, // <HASH (key) [16]>
00050     // UNUSED               = 0x49, // Old Opcode, don't use.
00051     KADEMLIA_PUBLISH_NOTES_RES_DEPRECATED   = 0x4A, // <HASH (key) [16]>
00052 
00053     KADEMLIA_FIREWALLED_REQ         = 0x50, // <TCPPORT (sender) [2]>
00054     KADEMLIA_FINDBUDDY_REQ          = 0x51, // <TCPPORT (sender) [2]>
00055     KADEMLIA_CALLBACK_REQ           = 0x52, // <TCPPORT (sender) [2]>
00056     KADEMLIA_FIREWALLED_RES         = 0x58, // <IP (sender) [4]>
00057     KADEMLIA_FIREWALLED_ACK_RES     = 0x59, // (null)
00058     KADEMLIA_FINDBUDDY_RES          = 0x5A  // <TCPPORT (sender) [2]>
00059 };
00060 
00061 #endif // KADC2CUDP_H
